thread.title: Made a Three Star a Five Star
thread.title_full: Made a Three Star a Five Star - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Upper East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: KTOWNFAN
title: Made a Three Star a Five Star
text:
We picked this Hotel because we needed to stay in the Upper east Side. Even though it was only a three star the exceptional service took it to a five star level. We asked for a quite room during our 10 day stay and that is what we received.
The Great:
For us Location
Free Coffee in the morning
Free Wifi
Good Security
First Class Customer Service
You will not go wrong at this Hotel.
Just for info:
There is no restaurant in the Hotel, however a few around the Hotel.
